snippet: Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights criticized the police for continuing to detain Beatrice Mtetwa, who was arrested the day after a largely peaceful referendum on a draft constitution.
abstract: Zimbabwean police continue to hold prominent human rights lawyer Beatrice Mtetwa despite court order that demanded her release.
lead_paragraph: Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights criticized the police for continuing to detain Beatrice Mtetwa, who was arrested the day after a largely peaceful referendum on a draft constitution.

headline.seo: Zimbabwe Police Defy Order to Free Lawyer, Group Says
headline.main: Zimbabwe Police Defy Order to Free Lawyer, Group Says
headline.print_headline:
Zimbabwe: Lawyer Still in Custody
As the Police Defy a Court Order

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
